## Showcasing plots {.tabset}

### Figure 1

```{r echo=FALSE}
pl <- ggplot(sb_locs_state, aes(x=population, y=n_stores, color=state)) + 
  geom_point(alpha=0.8)
ggplotly(pl)
```

### Figure 2

```{r echo=FALSE}
pl2 <- ggplot(sb_nutr, aes(x=Calories, fill=Category)) +

ggplotly(pl2)
```
